ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.coverUrl:
<js>
let replaceCover = (u) => {
    if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
    else u = u.substring(7)
    let uArr = u.split("/")
    uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
    let uArr2 = []
    uArr.forEach((x) => {
        if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
        else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
    })
    u = uArr2.join("/")
    return u
}
replaceCover(java.getString("thumb_url"))
</js>

} // AESåŠ å¯† function En(data, key, iv) { let aes = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv); return aes.encrypt(data); } // åè½¬HEX function rHex(num) { let hex = Number(num).toString(16).padStart(32, "0"); let res = ""; for (let i = hex.length; i > 0; i -= 2) { res += hex.substring(i - 2, i); } return res; } // è·å–KEY function getKey() { let key = b64De("rCXGfd2POMGzeiNIgo4iLg=="); let iv = java.strToBytes(java.randomUUID().slice(0, 16)); let did = baseUrl.match(/device_id=(\d+)/)[1]; let data = java.hexDecodeToByteArray(rHex(did)); let content = b64En(iv.concat(En(data, key, iv))); let obj = xGorgon( "/reading/crypt/registerkey?", "", gzip(JSON.stringify({ "content": content })) ); let res = b64De(obj.key); data = res.slice(16); iv = res.slice(0, 16); key = b64En(De(data, key, iv)); obj = { "key": key, "ver": obj.keyver } source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(obj, "", "\t")) } // è·å–URL function getBaseUrl() { return String(xGorgon( "reader/full", "item_id=" + item_id )).replace("bookapi/", ""); <js>
if (baseUrl.length == 27) {// è·å–"æˆ‘çš„ä¹¦æ¶"
    let $, url, header = {
        "headers": {
            "Cookie": java.getCookie("fanqienovel.com")
        }
    }
    url = "https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700," + JSON.stringify(header);
    $ = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
    if ($.code != 0) {
        java.toast("è¯·å…ˆç™»å½•è´¦å·ï¼");
        cookie.removeCookie("fanqienovel.com");
    } else {
        let books = $.data.book_shelf_info
            .map($ => ({
                book_id: $.book_id + "",
                item_id: "0"
            }));
        url = "https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail," + JSON.stringify(Object.assign({
            "body": {
                books: books
            },
            "method": "POST"
        }, header));
        result = java.ajax(url);
    }
}

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
æœç´¢æ¥å£2 = 1;
æœç´¢æ¥å£3 = 1;

let book_ids = [];
let book_list = [];
let KeyÂ Â  = String(java.get("key"));
let page = Number(java.get("page"));
let push = (u, p, t) => {
    try {
        if (!t) {
            // java.log(u);
            t = java.ajax(u);
        }
        let list = JSON.parse(t);
        for (let f of p) list = list[f];
        for (let _ of list) {
            if (!book_ids.includes(_.book_id)) {
                book_list.push(_.book_data ? _.book_data[0] : _);
                book_ids.push(_.book_id);
            }
        }
    } catch (e) {};
}


// æœç´¢-1
push(baseUrl, ["search_tabs", 3, "data"], result);


// æœç´¢-2
if(æœç´¢æ¥å£2) push(getHost(1, 3, 1, 5) + "/reading/bookapi/search/page/v/?aid=1967&channel=0&device_platform=0&device_type=0&iid=466614321180296&os_version=0&passback=" + ((page - 1) * 10) + "&query=" + Key + "&version_code=99999", ["data"]);


// æœç´¢-3,4  ##[13, 1967]
for (let aid of [1319, 2329]) {
    if(æœç´¢æ¥å£3) push(getHost(0, 4) + "/api/novel/channel/homepage/search/search/v1/?aid=" + aid + "&q=" + Key + "&offset=" + ((page - 1) * 10), ["data", "ret_data"]);
}


// è¿”å›
JSON.stringify(book_list);
</js>$[*]
